T02D2941:15a-0: badzra bi d'a ra na sna na bi dhi @15a * //
T02D2941:15a-3: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D2941:15a-4: las rnams bzhi po mthar phyin pa //
T02D2941:15a-5: phrin las rnam bzhi'i sku la 'dud //
T02D2941:15a-6: bum mang bca' bar mi nus la //
T02D2941:15a-7: phrin las rnam pa bzhi bo yi //
T02D2941:15a-8: bum gcig cho ga bstan par bya //
T02D2941:15a-9: rgyud nas phrin las rnam bzhi gsungs //
T02D2941:15a-10: bum gcig cho ga rnam pa bzhi //
T02D2941:15a-11: sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis //
T02D2941:15a-12: bum gcig cho ga bcu gnyis 'gyur //
T02D2941:15a-13: zhi ba dkar dang rgyas pa ser //
T02D2941:15a-14: dbang ni dmar dang drag po nag / bum pa mgul chings gzungs thag sogs //
T02D2941:15a-15: las dang mthun par 'gyur byas te //
T02D2941:15a-16: gu gul tsandan dud pa dang //
T02D2941:15a-17: las bzhi yi ni sngags dang ni //
T02D2941:15a-18: shin tu bsdus pa'i sngags kyis ni //
T02D2941:15a-19: bum pa bdug cing bsang ba bya //
T02D2941:15a-20: rgyu bzang bum pa tshad ldan nang //
T02D2941:15a-21: sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge ni //
T02D2941:15a-22: so so'i tshon gyis bris nas ni //
T02D2941:15a-23: sku gsung thugs ni gang byed pa'i//
T02D2941:15a-24: yi ge rdzas dang bcas pa ni //
T02D2941:15a-25: ras su gtums te bum nang gzhug / nad dang mtshon dang mu ge yi //
T02D2941:15a-26: bskal pa de dag sel byed cing //
T02D2941:15a-27: sman lnga rin chen 'bru lnga yis //
T02D2941:15a-28: bum pa yang ni dgang bar bya //
T02D2941:15a-29: tshul khrims dang ldan mchog yin phyir //
T02D2941:15a-30: dri dang snying pos bum pa bkang //
T02D2941:15a-31: de sogs bum rdzas sna tshogs btsal //
T02D2941:15a-32: bum pa rnams ni rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D2941:15a-33: bum pa la ni gdugs bu dbub //
T02D2941:15a-34: zhi ba yi ni mandal ni //
T02D2941:15a-36: rgyas pa rin chen ser po sna tshogs can //
T02D2941:15a-37: dbang la padma dmar po lcags kyus mtshan //
T02D2941:15a-38: drag po la ni mthing nag rtsibs brgyad do //
T02D2941:15a-39: bum gcig cho ga bsdus pa yis //
T02D2941:15a-40: gzhan gyi don ni byed gyur na //
T02D2941:15a-41: dkyil 'khor chen po bshams nas ni //
T02D2941:15a-42: zhi ba'i mandal shar du bri //
T02D2941:15a-43: rgyas pa'i lho dang dbang gi nub //
T02D2941:15a-44: drag po byang du bri ba ste //
T02D2941:15a-45: bum pa yang ni de der dgod //
T02D2941:15a-46: mchod dang gtor ma rgyas par bsham ;
T02D2941:15a-47: / ku sha'i stan ni gding bya ste //
T02D2941:15a-48: slob dpon smyung bar gnas pa'am //
T02D2941:15a-49: yang na dkar gsum zas la brten //
T02D2941:15a-50: gtsang ma'i gos sogs khrus byas te //
T02D2941:15a-51: bde ba'i stan la 'dug byas te //
T02D2941:15a-52: badzra bcu yis mtshams bcad de //
T02D2941:15a-53: rang snying bsil la h'um dgod de //
T02D2941:15b-0: de 'od bde @15b gshegs sbyan drangs te //
T02D2941:15b-1: mkha' la gsal bkod bdun rdzogs bya //
T02D2941:15b-2: chos nyid ngang gnas de rjes la //
T02D2941:15b-3: drag po'i h'um sgra stong zil gnon //
T02D2941:15b-4: stong gsum g-yo ldan mkha' 'byung bsam //
T02D2941:15b-5: de rjes h'um 'od ldan pa ni //
T02D2941:15b-6: nam mkha' la ni bsam par bya //
T02D2941:15b-7: de las yam bam lam sum chad //
T02D2941:15b-8: de dag rim gyis zhu gyur pas //
T02D2941:15b-10: de steng a'a: h'um bam zhu bas //
T02D2941:15b-11: zla nyi padma'i gdan du gyur //
T02D2941:15b-12: de steng h'um babs zhu gyur pas //
T02D2941:15b-13: sna tshogs pa yi rdo rje la //
T02D2941:15b-14: phyogs gcig yu bar gyur par bsam //
T02D2941:15b-15: de 'od bde gshegs mtha' dag bsdus //
T02D2941:15b-16: de gyur rdo rje snying po'o //
T02D2941:15b-17: sku ljang spyan gsum phyag gnyis pa //
T02D2941:15b-18: g-yas pa rdo rje rgya gram pa //
T02D2941:15b-19: ngos gcig yu bar 'dzin pa'i tshul //
T02D2941:15b-20: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub thugs kar 'dzin //
T02D2941:15b-21: g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang gar gyis bzhugs //
T02D2941:15b-22: dbu sgra gyen brdzes klu rigs brgyan //
T02D2941:15b-23: mche gtsigs phyag rdor sprul pa bsgom //
T02D2941:15b-24: de nas bum pa'i nang du ni //
T02D2941:15b-25: aa zhu bas ni bdud rtsi'i mtsho //
T02D2941:15b-26: de steng aa zhu zla pa bsam //
T02D2941:15b-27: de steng so so'i kha dog dang //
T02D2941:15b-28: ldan pa'i yi ge h'um bsam mo //
T02D2941:15b-29: gsung sgrub de la dmigs te sgrub //
T02D2941:15b-30: de zhu sna tshogs rdo rje la //
T02D2941:15b-31: phyogs gcig yu bar gyur par bsam//
T02D2941:15b-32: kha dog las dang mthun pa'o //
T02D2941:15b-33: thugs sgrub de la dmigs te sgrub //
T02D2941:15b-34: de zhu rdo rje snying po ni //
T02D2941:15b-35: sngon lta bar ni bsam par bya //
T02D2941:15b-36: de nas ye shes spyan drangs te //
T02D2941:15b-37: h'um 'jigs bcas lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog nas //
T02D2941:15b-38: rig sngags gsang sngags kun gyi bdag po ste //
T02D2941:15b-39: khro rgyal rdo rje 'dzin gyi rab sprul pa'i //
T02D2941:15b-40: khro rgyal rdo rje snying po gshegs su gsol //
T02D2941:15b-41: ha ra ha ra badzra bi d'a ra n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2941:15b-42: bra ha ra pra ha ra badzra pra bha nydza n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2941:15b-43: sngon lha'i ye shes spyan drangs te //
T02D2941:15b-44: phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bya //
T02D2941:15b-45: badzra brgyad dang k'i la lnga //
T02D2941:15b-46: badzra bdun sogs brjod byas pas//
T02D2941:15b-47: sku gsung thugs sogs byin gyis brlab //
T02D2941:15b-48: thugs h'um las byas bde gshegs bkug / na massa man sngags sogs kyis //
T02D2941:15b-49: khro bo la ni dbang bskur bsam //
T02D2941:15b-50: na mo ratna tra y'a yas //
T02D2941:15b-51: bum pa'i lha la phyag kyang bya //
T02D2941:15b-52: mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag mchod //
T02D2941:16a-2: sku sgrub de la dmigs te sgrub //
T02D2941:16a-3: de nas gzungs sngags rim pa gsum //
T02D2941:16a-4: mos pa'i bye brag bzlas par bya //
T02D2941:16a-5: nges skyo gtor btang ye shes dbyung //
T02D2941:16a-6: dam tshig bum lha 'od du zhu //
T02D2941:16a-7: rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal bya //
T02D2941:16a-8: de nas gzungs mchog ces bya ba ni ;
T02D2941:16a-9: / kun khyab gzungs chog bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2941:16a-10: yang na 'di ltar bya ba ste //
T02D2941:16a-11: shis brjod mang du byas nas ni //
T02D2941:16a-12: bya ba cing bsrung ba'i cho ga bya //
T02D2941:16a-13: rgyud kyi sbyor tshig la sogs pa //
T02D2941:16a-14: khrus chog rgyas par shes par bya'o //
T02D2941:16a-15: de ltar bum gcig ma'i cho ga bsdus pa'am /
T02D2941:16a-16: dgos pa'i bye brag gis shes par bya'o //
T02D2941:16a-17: bdag blo shin tu dman gyur kyang //
T02D2941:16a-19: las bzhi'i bum gcig cho ga 'bad //
T02D2941:16a-20: 'bad pas dge ba ci bsags pa //
T02D2941:16a-21: 'gro rnams re 'dod bskang bar shog / kun kyang
T02D2941:16a-22: 'di la 'jug gyur cig / slob dpon chen po
T02D2941:16a-24: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga rdzogs so /
T02D2941:16a-26: // / bal po'i pandi ta ma h'a pa na'i rang 'gyur ro /
T02D2941:16a-28: // / drag po'i gtso bum 'di skad do //
T02D2941:16a-29: cis kyang mi chod mi shigs pa //
T02D2941:16a-30: bden pa sra ba brtan pa ste //
T02D2941:16a-31: thams cad du ni thogs pa med //
T02D2941:16a-32: thams cad du ni ma pham pa //
T02D2941:16a-33: shes rab thugs kyi rang bzhin te //
T02D2941:16a-34: sems can thams cad skrag par byed //
T02D2941:16a-35: sems can thams cad 'jil bar byed //
T02D2941:16a-36: rig sngags thams cad gcod bar byed //
T02D2941:16a-37: gdon rnams thams cad brlag par byed //
T02D2941:16a-38: sems can thams cad rengs byed pa //
T02D2941:16a-39: k'i li k'i la'i sngags dang ni //
T02D2941:16a-40: tra ta ya yi sngags sogs kyis //
T02D2941:16a-41: phrin las drag po'i las mthar phyin //
T02D2941:16a-42: khro rgyal rdo rje rnam 'joms mthus //
T02D2941:16a-43: drag po'i bum chu 'di yis ni //
